sub_title: Director Global Enterprise Data Management B&I (Wavin)
summary:
A Master Data role in multi-international company on SAP & MDG environment and a dynamic cultures that produces a superior products and provides a superior service.
* Managing 15 Global MDM team
* Change Management 
* SAP MDG implementation 
* Head of Global Data Governance in FMCG; Pharmaceutical and Building & Infrastructure industry
* Broad experience in running and managing SAP deployment
* Global Implementation & international roll-out of SAP MDG
* Strong management, team leadership and organizational skills
* Experience in SAP Business Intelligence (BW/BI) Reporting and Trainer
* Key strength in developing Data Metrics Performance in Pareto & Fishbone Diagram analysis
* Team player, take direction & have the desire to be a thorough success
* Advance Excel & PowerPoint User and Trainer
* SAP SQL viewer, MS Office 365 (Power Point, Excel, Word, Visio)
* Supply Chain, Finance, Master Data background

profile_positions.description:
* Lead business MDM community in SAP MDG deployments
* Lead business strategy
* Define, champion and communicate the B&I Wavin Master Data vision across the company
* Define and lead the MDM Governance structure & MDM community within B&I Wavin
* Liaise with and support operational and commercial managers across B&I Wavin with master data challenges 
* Support IT with business orientation & drive IT tooling adoption by the business
* Developing maturity roadmaps for MDM across the businesses
* Identify, build support for and lead MDM improvement programs within all business areas across 20+ countries
* Ensure continuous improvement to optimize processes
profile_positions.title: Director Global Enterprise Data Management B&I

profile_positions.description:
○ Lead the design of Finance ERP MDM. Strive for simplification and standardization of the target MDM processes,
○ Work closely with the ERP project team to design the MDM structure,
○ Define ERP MDM governance, process and tools.
○ Propose MDM solution to be developed and deploy SAP MDG (Master Data Governance) across Sanofi organization
○ Ensure the alignment with other core model components or other rules (e.g. internal control) or projects (end to end approach),
○ Manage dependencies with other projects / streams of core model project, and potential other businesses (e.g. HR, Procurement..),
○ Drive implementation approach together with ITS, including data quality and cleansing,
○ Ensure the validation on the MDM core Model content, propose arbitration to the Core Model,
○ Governance bodies when needed, participate to regional functional governance when needed,
○ Monitors SOP’s for revisions that impact data within the ERP system,
○ Together with the Finance MDMD Head, set up ERP MDM governance and facilitate the governance processes,
○ Ensure monitoring of MDM governance and propose continuous improvements,
○ Work with SBS and businesses to organize the master data maintenance or run activities,
○ Harmonize the MDM governance and target solutions to geographies and businesses,
○ Lead ERP MDM stream governance (project committees, etc.) and provide active contributions to Finance System Transformation Program as needed (end to end integration with ERP or other solutions,reporting, communication, etc.),
○ Define roadmap of MDM for legacy systems (using ERP master data),
○ Contribute to the portfolio management and budget follow-up : Strategic plan / Budget portfolio reviews with regions and SSC counterparts and ITS.
profile_positions.title: MDM ERP Head

profile_positions.description:
	Ambassador for the project both within ASICS (at all levels of business) and externally
	Added value of master data management / governance / master data template and policies
	Manage all relevant master data processes for master data objects both globally as well as locally
	Implement Company Strategy / Vision into master data management / governance projects
	SLA and KPI Implementation 
	Plan and execute mid-term and long-term architecture and select the appropriate scenario with regards to master data management
	Prioritize, lead and manage projects and operations independent in cross-functional teams
	Establish processes around monitoring and measuring effectiveness of master data governance and execute
profile_positions.title: Global MDM Manager

profile_positions.description: Interim role to relieve someone who is on medical leave.
profile_positions.title: Head of Operation (Interim)

profile_positions.description:
• Leads a team focused on executing Master Data Maintenance, phase one of the Oracle ERP project.  The team is located in the Naarden BV , Netherlands operation.
• Formulates and recommends policy, process, management reporting requirements, quality metrics
• Leads the implementation and maintenance of Trading Community Architecture in all data domains ( Customer, Supplier and Banking)
• Provides guidance in technical and functional problem resolution
• Serves as a champion for escalation necessary; interfacing with the larger global functional team and country locations 
• Provides strategic representation of the Customer Data Maintenance Organization when working with Genzyme's business units or country locations
• Lead the strategy development and associated process build for data enrichment requirements
• Leads data evaluation and preparation activity required for conversion in phase one and two of the Oracle project
• Serves on the Global Customer Data Council
profile_positions.title: Manager European Customer Data Maintenance Organization

profile_positions.description: performing gaps, process & procedures and provides guidance on best practice.
profile_positions.title: Consultant Material Master Implementation & Centralization

profile_positions.description:
BUSINESS RULES
*Owner of SAP master data business rules, maintain business standards/definitions, ensure updates are communicated globally
PRODUCT HIERARCHIES
*Creation of global product hierarchy structure & hierarchy keys in SAP
*Coordinate all hierarchy re-alignment proposals
MATERIALS (SKUS)
*Creation of global material data centrally
*New skus & changes to existing global data are executed & communicated globally
*Key role in the assessment of change requests impacting all Material MD views
SKU HARMONIZATION & RATIONALIZATION
*Project Coordinator for SKU harmonization activities working with Brand Owners to validate global data sets & identify duplication of SKUs across LOCs.
*Create a plan to remove duplication from SAP & Identify opportunities to rationalize SKUs
*Through new brand acquisitions across multiple markets, ensure a harmonization approach is part of the data migration activities
MASTER DATA PERFORMANCE METRICS & SUPPLY CHAIN KPI’S
*Assist with the ongoing development of KPIs in conjunction w/ Supply Chain & Business Warehouse community, Global Competence Centre & Logistics Team
*Proactive in identifying process & structural problems in KPI reports & make recommendations to correct
*Initiate Global master data performance metrics to measures SLAs for both business & central MD support team
INTEGRITY REPORTS & AUDIT
*Create SAP view query for global control reports that complies with SOX compliance
*Coordinate and participate with annual SOX audit
BUSINESS WAREHOUSE (BW)
*Coordinate and participate in setting up various BW reports for Supply Chain & Master Data
*Train BW end user through it’s navigation & definition of it’s attributes
*Create quick reference card for BW users
TRAINING DOCUMENTATION
*Create & update training documents relating to Materials & Product Hierarchies business process & roll out globally
*Setup central master data repository on web portal for master data community
*Business Warehouse (BW) & Advance excel trainer to end user
profile_positions.title: Global Data Controller/ Material Master Data
